me.kinomoto.kpub

Class LangModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kinomoto.kpub.LangModel

  • public class LangModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and manages all Langs. Updates lang combobox in ArticleMainView.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.List<Lang> langs
      Store all Langs here

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Lang getLangById(int id)
      returns first Lang in langs with Lang.getLangID() = ID or null if not founded
      static Lang getLangByNameEN(java.lang.String nameEN)
      returns first Lang in langs with Lang.getNameEN() = nameEN or null if not founded
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLangsList()
      uses Lang.getNameEN() to generate String
      static java.lang.String[][] getModelStringArray() 
      static void loadLang(java.sql.Statement statement)
      Loads Langs from database.
      static void newLang()
      create new Lang, fires Lang.updateLangArticleModel()
      static void removeLang(Lang lang)
      removes Lang from langs and database, and fires Lang.updateLangArticleModel()
